history.content: I think what's done is done at this point. You could potentially edit your application, although very few allow this. Another option would be to speak to a recruiter (if applicable) and let them know of the change or potentially reapply.

Hi guys, so I’m in a very awkward situation. I was applied math major and declared CS double major early this semester. I applied to a dozen of companies on handshake but just realized that my major is still maths. Some of the internships I applied to specifically requires CS major and I’m officially listed as not satisfying their requirement. What should I do?
history.subject: Need help.. Major change not reflected on Handshake
